text: Farah may refer to: * Farah (name) * Farah River, a river in western Afghanistan * Farah, Afghanistan, a town in southwest Afghanistan on the banks Farah River * Farah, India, a town in Uttar Pradesh, India * Farah Province, one of the western provinces of Afghanistan ==See also== *Fara (disambiguation) *Farra (disambiguation)
title: Farah
